message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your operations or personal projects. Considering its quality and features, I'm extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase this product at $20000.
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can we meet in the middle at $14000?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your offer. In light of that, I am willing to consider a price closer to your proposal. My counteroffer for the product would be $16000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement that suits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Can we meet in the middle at $14500?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've reviewed your latest offer and I'm pleased to present a counteroffer of $15500. This is my final offer before considering other potential buyers. I hope this aligns better with your budget and we can move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate your final offer, but $15500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you meet me at $14000?

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $14500 for the product. This is my best offer. I believe it strikes a good balance between our interests. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $14500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $14000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you meet me at $14000?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering the negotiations so far, I am prepared to finalize the deal at $14300 for the product. This is my final offer. I believe it represents a fair compromise given our discussions.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14300 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you meet me at $13500?
